      • Owner

        public Owner(OwnerGUI frame,
             client.controller.CommunicationManager cManager,
             client.controller.PermissionController pControl)
        creates an Owner with a given OwnerGUI
        Parameters:
        frame - the OwnerGUI that this owner will use
        cManager - the CommunicationManager that will handle communication between the owner and the server
        pControl - the permission controller assigned to this owner
